article.content:
Note: all times are US Eastern Time.

Date Time Topic Presenter(s) Where
Mar 24 Wed 5:30 Remote research: A bioinformatics adventure for undergraduates Casey Schmidt Education Platform Session
6:00 Genomics Education Partnership (GEP; thegep.org) is a nationwide collaboration of faculty from 100+ institutions which aims to integrate Course-based Undergraduate Research Experiences (CUREs) centered in genomics and bioinformatics into the curriculum Vida Mingo Education Platform Session
Mar 31 Wed 10:00 453C: Pipsqeuak localization to the histone locus body Dabin Cho Poster Presentation
Apr 1 Thu 12:30 453C: Pipsqeuak localization to the histone locus body Dabin Cho Poster Presentation
